website_summaries.verdict: Chrome-finish, heavy-duty pegs (2) for Mongoose Freestyle or any bike with standard axle diameter.
pros: 2 pegs in each pack to install on either side of front or rear axle
Pegs enable rider to do cool tricks on the Mongoose Freestyle
Can also be fit onto other BMX-freestyle bikes with standard axle diameter and threads per inch
Chrome finish looks awesome, adds to impact of tricks
cons: Some people had difficulty installing the pegs on certain types of bikes
Need to check with manufacturer for axle diameter to confirm compatibility

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and Easy to Install
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these for my 7 year oldʻs Christmas bike. Sheʻs not a hardcore BMX rider (yet), so these havenʻt been put through any strenuous use, but they are well made and were easy to install. When she starts doing peg grinds, Iʻll report back. ;-)
customer_reviews.author: Aloha Auntie

customer_reviews.title: Would not buy again
customer_reviews.text: Product received was not like the product in the picture Mongoose name on the pegs was not in Black lettering it was all Chrome
customer_reviews.author: Charlie M.

customer_reviews.title: Finsh not what I expected
customer_reviews.text: I ended up returning this product because the chrome finish was of a pretty low quality and not as nice as I was hoping for (for the price). Threads were fine and product would install as advertised, I was just hoping for something a bit more cosmetically appealing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The Chrome matches the frame perfectly and looks really good. Easy to install
customer_reviews.text: I recently bought a cheap BMX bike as a camp bike. Bought these pegs so that I can have a passenger. The Chrome matches the frame perfectly and looks really good. Easy to install, but I needed a set of deep metric sockets and an extension to install.
customer_reviews.author: Lucorb

customer_reviews.title: I love the chrome
customer_reviews.text: These look amazing, but they are not the best for tricks simply because they can unscrew from the bolts resulting in the wheel to coming off. Be careful
customer_reviews.author: Neil Kappstrong

customer_reviews.title: Seem okay so far
customer_reviews.text: Material looked flawed or like it wasn’t stored well. The metal had spots like something got on it so it didn’t look new. Despite the poor appearance, my daughter was excited to put them on her bike & they seem sturdy so far.
customer_reviews.author: Natasha

customer_reviews.title: Would purchase these again
customer_reviews.text: Good quality and pretty sturdy. Had no issues with them since putting them on my step daughters bike
customer_reviews.author: Stephen W.

customer_reviews.title: No tools required
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to put on, no tools needed. Affordable and durablr pegs.
customer_reviews.author: Purple Elephant

customer_reviews.title: Looks and works good!
customer_reviews.text: Not too heavy or light. Very easy to install and sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Star

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Awesome! I plan to get another set. Fast shipping and look bad A$$!!!!! for the money.
customer_reviews.author: john O'keeffe

customer_reviews.title: mongoose pegs from Amazon
customer_reviews.text: Look at the site and youll notice 4 pegs. once you order them you only get 2 pegs. false advertisement comes to mind. if your selling 2 pegs, dont picture a complete set and then send 2.
customer_reviews.author: K.C. Mo

customer_reviews.title: MEH
customer_reviews.text: Not bad. Chrome is so-so. Mongoose is stamped on not black lettering like the photo. I was hoping I could remove the lettering but there’s no way with it being stamped. Oh well,
customer_reviews.author: Dennis Morada

product_meta.title: Protective Technologies Mongoose Freestyle Bike Pegs
product_meta.description:
FROM THE MANUFACTURER
Styles may vary. Sold as a set.

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.
